# Hello world! üëã  

I am passionate about **application development** and **automation**, constantly exploring the world of **Full Stack** and **DevOps**. I believe that tools and programming languages are means to solve problems, and I‚Äôm always up to learn new technologies when needed to deliver **efficient** and **innovative solutions**.

At home, I maintain a **24/7 server** powered by **Proxmox VE**, where I host various services and applications using **Docker, LXC, and virtual machines**. To expand my knowledge, I‚Äôve integrated this setup with **Oracle Cloud**, creating a **hybrid environment** that allows me to explore and deepen my understanding of **cloud technologies**.
